title: The Man who knew too much [DVD]
brief_description: Doctor Ben McKenna and his wife Jo take their ten year old son on holiday to Morocco and get caught up in a web of intrigue when he is kidnapped. They are forced to travel to London to find him which results in a memorable murder sequence at the Royal Albert Hall. Stars James Stewart and Doris Day. Screenplay by John Michael Hayes, based on the story by Chales Bennett and D. B. Wyndham-Lewis. Cinematography by Robert Burks.
